comment: Smart Data Models - GovSteamFV4 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovSteamFV4/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Detailed electro-hydraulic governor for steam unit.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: cpsmn
contents.comment: Minimum value of pressure regulator output (Cpsmn).  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: cpsmx
contents.comment: Maximum value of pressure regulator output (Cpsmx).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: crmn
contents.comment: Minimum value of regulator set-point (Crmn).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: crmx
contents.comment: Maximum value of regulator set-point (Crmx).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kdc
contents.comment: Derivative gain of pressure regulator (Kdc).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf1
contents.comment: Frequency bias (reciprocal of droop) (Kf1).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf3
contents.comment: Frequency control (reciprocal of droop) (Kf3).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: khp
contents.comment: Fraction  of total turbine output generated by HP part (Khp).  Typical Value = 0.35. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kic
contents.comment: Integral gain of pressure regulator (Kic).  Typical Value = 0.0033. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kip
contents.comment: Integral gain of pressure feedback regulator (Kip).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kit
contents.comment: Integral gain of electro-hydraulic regulator (Kit).  Typical Value = 0.04. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kmp1
contents.comment: First gain coefficient of  intercept valves characteristic (Kmp1).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kmp2
contents.comment: Second gain coefficient of intercept valves characteristic (Kmp2).  Typical Value = 3.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpc
contents.comment: Proportional gain of pressure regulator (Kpc).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpp
contents.comment: Proportional gain of pressure feedback regulator (Kpp).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpt
contents.comment: Proportional gain of electro-hydraulic regulator (Kpt).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: krc
contents.comment: Maximum variation of fuel flow (Krc).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ksh
contents.comment: Pressure loss due to flow friction in the boiler tubes (Ksh).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0.0

contents.name: lpi
contents.comment: Maximum negative power error (Lpi).  Typical Value = -0.15. Default: 0.0

contents.name: lps
contents.comment: Maximum positive power error (Lps).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mnef
contents.comment: Lower limit for frequency correction (MN).  Typical Value = -0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mxef
contents.comment: Upper limit for frequency correction (MX).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pr1
contents.comment: First value of pressure set point static characteristic (Pr1).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pr2
contents.comment: Second value of pressure set point static characteristic, corresponding to Ps0 = 1.0 PU (Pr2).  Typical Value = 0.75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: psmn
contents.comment: Minimum value of pressure set point static characteristic (Psmn).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rsmimn
contents.comment: Minimum value of integral regulator (Rsmimn).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rsmimx
contents.comment: Maximum value of integral regulator (Rsmimx).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rvgmn
contents.comment: Minimum value of integral regulator (Rvgmn).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rvgmx
contents.comment: Maximum value of integral regulator (Rvgmx).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: srmn
contents.comment: Minimum valve opening (Srmn).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: srmx
contents.comment: Maximum valve opening (Srmx).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: srsmp
contents.comment: Intercept valves characteristic discontinuity point (Srsmp).  Typical Value = 0.43. Default: 0.0

contents.name: svmn
contents.comment: Maximum regulator gate closing velocity (Svmn).  Typical Value = -0.0333. Default: 0.0

contents.name: svmx
contents.comment: Maximum regulator gate opening velocity (Svmx).  Typical Value = 0.0333. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Control valves rate opening time (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

contents.name: tam
contents.comment: Intercept valves rate opening time (Tam).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Control valves rate closing time (Tc).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: tcm
contents.comment: Intercept valves rate closing time (Tcm).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: tdc
contents.comment: Derivative time constant of pressure regulator (Tdc).  Typical Value = 90. Default: 0

contents.name: tf1
contents.comment: Time constant of fuel regulation (Tf1).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: tf2
contents.comment: Time constant of steam chest (Tf2).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: thp
contents.comment: High pressure (HP) time constant of the turbine (Thp).  Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0

contents.name: tmp
contents.comment: Low pressure (LP) time constant of the turbine (Tmp).  Typical Value = 0.4. Default: 0

contents.name: trh
contents.comment: Reheater  time constant of the turbine (Trh).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: tv
contents.comment: Boiler time constant (Tv).  Typical Value = 60. Default: 0

contents.name: ty
contents.comment: Control valves servo time constant (Ty).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: y
contents.comment: Coefficient of linearized equations of turbine (Stodola formulation) (Y).  Typical Value = 0.13. Default: 0.0

contents.name: yhpmn
contents.comment: Minimum control valve position (Yhpmn).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: yhpmx
contents.comment: Maximum control valve position (Yhpmx).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ympmn
contents.comment: Minimum intercept valve position (Ympmn).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ympmx
contents.comment: Maximum intercept valve position (Ympmx).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
